Introduction

Jeon Bo-ram is a South Korean singer and actress. She is best known for being a member of the girl group T-ARA and their Japanese sub-unit QBS.

She debuted as a solo artist on April 15, 2008 with her first digital single "Lucifer Project Vol 1. Love".

On May 7, 2017, MBK Entertainment announced the she, along with Soyeon, would be leaving T-ara. Later in 2019 she shortly returned to acting before going on hiatus to take care of her mother.

In late 2023 Boram opened her official Japan fanclub and announced that she would be hosting her own radio show.
